body:
I'd recommend to create DTO object that will contain the same properties as json object you send to the controller, e.g. if json object is

{name: 'Roman', age: 29}

than DTO class would be

public class PersonDTO
{
  public string Name {get; set;}
  public int Age {get; set; }
}

Having this in place you api method would look like this:

[HttpPut]
[Route("")]
public IHttpActionResult UpdateById([FromBody]PersonDTO updated)
{...}

Now, inside the method you could map it to anything you need.

With this approach Web API handles all serialization/deserialization for you.
